content.rendered: The TED Blog collects news about TEDTalks, TED conferences, TED Prize projects and all the other initiatives and projects of TED, as well as items of interest to our community. Look here for live coverage of every TED conference, as well as news of every day’s posted TEDTalk. And thanks for reading!
